name: Keg Wars
description:
Keg Wars is  a new take of the classic Tic Tac Toe game. Instead of crosses and circles you play units with difference stats and abilities but the goal still remains, do a 3 in a row.

A game by:

Daniel Vicente - Game Design / Programming

Fábio Pinto - Game Design / 2D Art 

Vasco Rodrigues - 3D Art

Rules:

- Each player takes turns playing one unit.

- There is friendly fire. Be careful and think strategically!

- No ties. In case of full board 1 damage is dealt to all units until a space becomes available. Play around this!

Let us know what you think of the game!

Flying Pan Team

THIS IS KEG WARS!

Keg Wars is a product of alot of work and time invested for us devs. If you enjoyed the game and would like to support it the best way is to donate to us via this link: paypal.me/fabiopintoart
